sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SACRAMENTARIANS, a general name given to all ſuch as have publiſhed or held erroneous doctrines of the ſacrament of the Lord’s Supper. The term is chiefly applied among Roman Catholics, by way of reproach, to the Lutherans, Calviniſts, and other Proteſtants.
